analytic.title: Adaptive Development of Connectionist Decoders for Complex Error-Correcting Codes

abstract.p: \Ve present. an approach for df'velopment of a decoder for any complex binary error-correct.ing code-(ECC) via training from examples of decoded received words. Our decoder is a connectionist architecture. We describe two sepa.rate solutions: A system-level solution (the Cascaded Networks Decoder); and the ECC-Enhanced Decoder, a solution which simplifies the mapping problem which must be solved for decoding. Although both solutions meet our basic approach constraint for simplicity and compact-ness. only the ECC-Enhanced Decoder meet.s our second basic constraint of being a generic solution.
